name: Omega Consulting Intl SAS
goal:
Our organization represents and works with Subsea interconnection producers, renewable energy project promoters, energy transmission projects, innovation, 3D printing, additive manufacturing and space mining activities.

Our goal is to provide advocacy for their interests, and relate EU priorities to our clients to align goals to achieve cost effective, relevant, and timely "to market" approaches.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
